verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> year אַחַ֗ת <WH259> In the first לְדָרְיָ֛וֶשׁ <WH1867> of Darius בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחַשְׁוֵר֖וֹשׁ <WH325> of Ahasuerus מִזֶּ֣רַע <WH2233> of the seed מָדָ֑י <WH4074> of the Medes אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who הָמְלַ֔ךְ <WH4427> which was made king עַ֖ל <WH5921> over מַלְכ֥וּת <WH4438> over the realm כַּשְׂדִּֽים׃ <WH3778> of the Chaldeans

בִּשְׁנַ֤ת <WH8141> year אַחַת֙ <WH259> In the first לְמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> of his reign אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I דָּֽנִיֵּ֔אל <WH1840> I Daniel בִּינֹ֖תִי <WH995> understood בַּסְּפָרִ֑ים <WH5612> by books מִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> the number הַשָּׁנִ֗ים <WH8141> of the years אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> was דְבַר־ <WH1697> whereof the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יִרְמִיָ֣ה <WH3414> came to Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <WH5030> the prophet לְמַלֹּ֛אות <WH4390> that he would accomplish לְחָרְב֥וֹת <WH2723> in the desolations יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> seventy שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years

וָאֶתְּנָ֣ה <WH5414> And I set אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנַ֗י <WH6440> my face אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲדֹנָי֙ <WH136> unto the Lord הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> God לְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <WH1245> to seek תְּפִלָּ֖ה <WH8605> by prayer וְתַחֲנוּנִ֑ים <WH8469> and supplications בְּצ֖וֹם <WH6685> with fasting וְשַׂ֥ק <WH8242> and sackcloth וָאֵֽפֶר׃ <WH665> and ashes

וָֽאֶתְפַּֽלְלָ֛ה <WH6419> And I prayed לַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהַ֖י <WH430> my God וָאֶתְוַדֶּ֑ה <WH3034> and made my confession וָאֹֽמְרָ֗ה <WH559> and said אָנָּ֤א <WH577> O אֲדֹנָי֙ <WH136> Lord הָאֵ֤ל <WH410> God הַגָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> the great וְהַנּוֹרָ֔א <WH3372> and dreadful שֹׁמֵ֤ר <WH8104> keeping הַבְּרִית֙ <WH1285> the covenant וְֽהַחֶ֔סֶד <WH2617> and mercy לְאֹהֲבָ֖יו <WH157> to them that love וּלְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <WH8104> him and to them that keep מִצְוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH4687> his commandments

חָטָ֥אנוּ <WH2398> We have sinned וְעָוִ֖ינוּ <WH5753> and have committed iniquity [וְהִרְשַׁעְנוּ כ] (הִרְשַׁ֣עְנוּ <WH7561> condemn ק) וּמָרָ֑דְנוּ <WH4775> and have rebelled וְס֥וֹר <WH5493> even by departing מִמִּצְוֹתֶ֖ךָ <WH4687> from thy precepts וּמִמִּשְׁפָּטֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4941> and from thy judgments

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> have not שָׁמַ֙עְנוּ֙ <WH8085> Neither have we hearkened אֶל־ <WH413> to עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <WH5650> unto thy servants הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <WH5030> the prophets אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who דִּבְּרוּ֙ <WH1696> which spake בְּשִׁמְךָ֔ <WH8034> in thy name אֶל־ <WH413> to מְלָכֵ֥ינוּ <WH4428> to our kings שָׂרֵ֖ינוּ <WH8269> our princes וַאֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH1> and our fathers וְאֶ֖ל <WH413> and כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַ֥ם <WH5971> and to all the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

לְךָ֤ אֲדֹנָי֙ <WH136> O Lord הַצְּדָקָ֔ה <WH6666> righteousness וְלָ֛נוּ בֹּ֥שֶׁת <WH1322> [belongeth] unto thee but unto us confusion הַפָּנִ֖ים <WH6440> of faces כַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> as at this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> is this לְאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> to the men יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah וּלְיוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> and to the inhabitants יְרֽוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וּֽלְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֞ל <WH3478> and unto all Israel הַקְּרֹבִ֣ים <WH7138> [that are] near וְהָרְחֹקִ֗ים <WH7350> and [that are] far off בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָֽאֲרָצוֹת֙ <WH776> through all the countries אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> to which הִדַּחְתָּ֣ם <WH5080> whither thou hast driven שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> because בְּמַעֲלָ֖ם <WH4604> them because of their trespass אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which מָֽעֲלוּ־ <WH4603> that they have trespassed בָֽךְ׃

יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Lord לָ֚נוּ בֹּ֣שֶׁת <WH1322> to us [belongeth] confusion הַפָּנִ֔ים <WH6440> of face לִמְלָכֵ֥ינוּ <WH4428> to our kings לְשָׂרֵ֖ינוּ <WH8269> to our princes וְלַאֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH1> and to our fathers אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> because חָטָ֖אנוּ <WH2398> because we have sinned לָֽךְ׃

לַֽאדֹנָ֣י <WH136> To the Lord אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> our God הָרַחֲמִ֖ים <WH7356> [belong] mercies וְהַסְּלִח֑וֹת <WH5547> and forgivenesses כִּ֥י <WH3588> for מָרַ֖דְנוּ <WH4775> though we have rebelled בּֽוֹ׃

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor שָׁמַ֔עְנוּ <WH8085> Neither have we obeyed בְּק֖וֹל <WH6963> the voice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> our God לָלֶ֤כֶת <WH1980> to walk בְּתֽוֹרֹתָיו֙ <WH8451> in his laws אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> which he set לְפָנֵ֔ינוּ <WH6440> before בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> us by עֲבָדָ֥יו <WH5650> his servants הַנְּבִיאִֽים׃ <WH5030> the prophets

וְכָל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yea all Israel עָֽבְרוּ֙ <WH5674> have transgressed אֶת־ <WH853> תּ֣וֹרָתֶ֔ךָ <WH8451> thy law וְס֕וֹר <WH5493> even by departing לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> not שְׁמ֣וֹעַ <WH8085> that they might not obey בְּקֹלֶ֑ךָ <WH6963> thy voice וַתִּתַּ֨ךְ <WH5413> is poured עָלֵ֜ינוּ <WH5921> so הָאָלָ֣ה <WH423> therefore the curse וְהַשְּׁבֻעָ֗ה <WH7621> upon us and the oath אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which כְּתוּבָה֙ <WH3789> that [is] written בְּתוֹרַת֙ <WH8451> in the law מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> of Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> the servant הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God כִּ֥י <WH3588> for חָטָ֖אנוּ <WH2398> because we have sinned לֽוֹ׃

וַיָּ֜קֶם <WH6965> And he hath confirmed אֶת־ <WH853> [דְּבָרָיו כ] (דְּבָרֹ֣ו <WH1697> act ק) אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> which he spake עָלֵ֗ינוּ <WH5921> against וְעַ֤ל <WH5921> and against שֹֽׁפְטֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH8199> against us and against our judges אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who שְׁפָט֔וּנוּ <WH8199> that judged לְהָבִ֥יא <WH935> us by bringing עָלֵ֖ינוּ <WH5921> and against רָעָ֣ה <WH7451> evil גְדֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> upon us a great אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> has not נֶעֶשְׂתָ֗ה <WH6213> hath not been done תַּ֚חַת <WH8478> under כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> for under the whole heaven כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who נֶעֶשְׂתָ֖ה <WH6213> as hath been done בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> upon Jerusalem

כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> it כָּתוּב֙ <WH3789> As [it is] written בְּתוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> in the law מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> of Moses אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָרָעָ֥ה <WH7451> all this evil הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise בָּ֣אָה <WH935> is come עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> and וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not חִלִּ֜ינוּ <WH2470> upon us yet made we not our prayer אֶת־ <WH854> for פְּנֵ֣י ׀ <WH6440> before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> our God לָשׁוּב֙ <WH7725> that we might turn מֵֽעֲוֹנֵ֔נוּ <WH5771> from our iniquities וּלְהַשְׂכִּ֖יל <WH7919> and understand בַּאֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH571> thy truth

וַיִּשְׁקֹ֤ד <WH8245> watched יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Therefore hath the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> respect הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> upon the evil וַיְבִיאֶ֖הָ <WH935> and brought עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> respect כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for צַדִּ֞יק <WH6662> [is] righteous יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> it upon us for the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> our God עַל־ <WH5921> respect כָּל־ <WH3605> to all מַֽעֲשָׂיו֙ <WH4639> in all his works אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> which he doeth וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> have not שָׁמַ֖עְנוּ <WH8085> for we obeyed בְּקֹלֽוֹ׃ <WH6963> not his voice

וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <WH6258> and now אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> And now O Lord אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> our God אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> who הוֹצֵ֨אתָ <WH3318> forth אֶֽת־ <WH853> עַמְּךָ֜ <WH5971> thy people מֵאֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> of Egypt בְּיָ֣ד <WH3027> hand חֲזָקָ֔ה <WH2389> with a mighty וַתַּֽעַשׂ־ <WH6213> and hast gotten לְךָ֥ שֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> thee renown כַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> as at this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> is this חָטָ֖אנוּ <WH2398> we have sinned רָשָֽׁעְנוּ׃ <WH7561> we have done wickedly

אֲדֹנָ֗י <WH136> O Lord כְּכָל־ <WH3605> all צִדְקֹתֶ֙ךָ֙ <WH6666> according to all thy righteousness יָֽשָׁב־ <WH7725> be turned away נָ֤א <WH4994> now אַפְּךָ֙ <WH639> I beseech thee let thine anger וַחֲמָ֣תְךָ֔ <WH2534> and thy fury מֵעִֽירְךָ֥ <WH5892> from thy city יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> Jerusalem הַר־ <WH2022> mountain קָדְשֶׁ֑ךָ <WH6944> thy holy כִּ֤י <WH3588> because בַחֲטָאֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH2399> because for our sins וּבַעֲוֹנ֣וֹת <WH5771> and for the iniquities אֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <WH1> of our fathers יְרוּשָׁלִַ֧ם <WH3389> Jerusalem וְעַמְּךָ֛ <WH5971> and thy people לְחֶרְפָּ֖ה <WH2781> [are become] a reproach לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all סְבִיבֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5439> to all [that are] about

וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <WH6258> now שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> hear אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> Now therefore O our God אֶל־ <WH413> to תְּפִלַּ֤ת <WH8605> the prayer עַבְדְּךָ֙ <WH5650> of thy servant וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to תַּ֣חֲנוּנָ֔יו <WH8469> and his supplications וְהָאֵ֣ר <WH215> to shine פָּנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> and cause thy face עַל־ <WH5921> and מִקְדָּשְׁךָ֖ <WH4720> upon thy sanctuary הַשָּׁמֵ֑ם <WH8076> that is desolate לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> your sake אֲדֹנָֽי׃ <WH136> for the Lord's

הַטֵּ֨ה <WH5186> incline אֱלֹהַ֥י ׀ <WH430> O my God אָזְנְךָ֮ <WH241> thine ear וּֽשֲׁמָע֒ <WH8085> and hear [פִּקְחָה כ] (פְּקַ֣ח <WH6491> open ק) עֵינֶ֗יךָ <WH5869> thine eyes וּרְאֵה֙ <WH7200> and behold שֹֽׁמְמֹתֵ֔ינוּ <WH8077> laid וְהָעִ֕יר <WH5892> and the city אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נִקְרָ֥א <WH7121> which is called שִׁמְךָ֖ <WH8034> by thy name עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> account כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> not עַל־ <WH5921> account צִדְקֹתֵ֗ינוּ <WH6666> thee for our righteousnesses אֲנַ֨חְנוּ <WH587> we מַפִּילִ֤ים <WH5307> for we do not present תַּחֲנוּנֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH8469> our supplications לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> before כִּ֖י <WH3588> on עַל־ <WH5921> account רַחֲמֶ֥יךָ <WH7356> mercies הָרַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> but for thy great

אֲדֹנָ֤י ׀ <WH136> O Lord שְׁמָ֙עָה֙ <WH8085> hear אֲדֹנָ֣י ׀ <WH136> O Lord סְלָ֔חָה <WH5545> forgive אֲדֹנָ֛י <WH136> O Lord הַֽקֲשִׁ֥יבָה <WH7181> hearken וַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH6213> and do אַל־ <WH408> not תְּאַחַ֑ר <WH309> defer לְמַֽעֲנְךָ֣ <WH4616> sake אֱלֹהַ֔י <WH430> for thine own sake O my God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> by thy name נִקְרָ֔א <WH7121> are called עַל־ <WH5921> and עִירְךָ֖ <WH5892> for thy city וְעַל־ <WH5921> and עַמֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5971> and thy people

וְע֨וֹד <WH5750> now while אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I מְדַבֵּר֙ <WH1696> And whiles I [was] speaking וּמִתְפַּלֵּ֔ל <WH6419> and praying וּמִתְוַדֶּה֙ <WH3034> and confessing חַטָּאתִ֔י <WH2403> my sin וְחַטַּ֖את <WH2403> and the sin עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> of my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel וּמַפִּ֣יל <WH5307> and presenting תְּחִנָּתִ֗י <WH8467> my supplication לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהַ֔י <WH430> my God עַ֖ל <WH5921> behalf הַר־ <WH2022> mountain קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> for the holy אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> of my God

וְע֛וֹד <WH5750> while אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I מְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> Yea whiles I [was] speaking בַּתְּפִלָּ֑ה <WH8605> in prayer וְהָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> even the man גַּבְרִיאֵ֡ל <WH1403> Gabriel אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> whom רָאִ֨יתִי <WH7200> whom I had seen בֶחָז֤וֹן <WH2377> in the vision בַּתְּחִלָּה֙ <WH8462> at the beginning מֻעָ֣ף <WH3286> being caused to fly בִּיעָ֔ף <WH3288> swiftly נֹגֵ֣עַ <WH5060> touched אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about כְּעֵ֖ת <WH6256> me about the time מִנְחַת־ <WH4503> oblation עָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> of the evening

וַיָּ֖בֶן <WH995> And he informed וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> [me] and talked עִמִּ֑י <WH5973> with וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <WH559> with me and said דָּנִיֵּ֕אל <WH1840> O Daniel עַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> have now יָצָ֖אתִי <WH3318> I am now come forth לְהַשְׂכִּילְךָ֥ <WH7919> to give thee skill בִינָֽה׃ <WH998> and understanding

בִּתְחִלַּ֨ת <WH8462> At the beginning תַּחֲנוּנֶ֜יךָ <WH8469> of thy supplications יָצָ֣א <WH3318> came forth דָבָ֗ר <WH1697> the commandment וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> and I בָּ֣אתִי <WH935> and I am come לְהַגִּ֔יד <WH5046> to shew כִּ֥י <WH3588> for חֲמוּד֖וֹת <WH2530> beauty אָ֑תָּה <WH859> you וּבִין֙ <WH995> therefore understand בַּדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> the matter וְהָבֵ֖ן <WH995> and consider בַּמַּרְאֶֽה׃ <WH4758> the vision

שָׁבֻעִ֨ים <WH7620> weeks שִׁבְעִ֜ים <WH7657> Seventy נֶחְתַּ֥ךְ <WH2852> are determined עַֽל־ <WH5921> for עַמְּךָ֣ ׀ <WH5971> upon thy people וְעַל־ <WH5921> and עִ֣יר <WH5892> city קָדְשֶׁ֗ךָ <WH6944> and upon thy holy לְכַלֵּ֨א <WH3607> to finish הַפֶּ֜שַׁע <WH6588> the transgression [וּלַחְתֹּם כ] (וּלְהָתֵ֤ם <WH2856> to seal ק) [חַטָּאֹות כ] (חַטָּאת֙ <WH2403> sin ק) וּלְכַפֵּ֣ר <WH3722> and to make reconciliation עָוֹ֔ן <WH5771> for iniquity וּלְהָבִ֖יא <WH935> and to bring in צֶ֣דֶק <WH6664> righteousness עֹֽלָמִ֑ים <WH5769> everlasting וְלַחְתֹּם֙ <WH2856> and to seal up חָז֣וֹן <WH2377> the vision וְנָבִ֔יא <WH5030> and prophecy וְלִמְשֹׁ֖חַ <WH4886> and to anoint קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> the most קָֽדָשִֽׁים׃ <WH6944> Holy
